GeneralInformation.eligibility: All participants, but will be played according to Pub Trivia rules and format.

team.captain_requirement: Each team must designate a captain prior to the beginning of the game.

individual.clarification: A single player may compete in trivia tournaments alongside teams or other individuals.

Registration.notes: Teams must designate their captain during registration. If individuals play, the sole player is automatically the captain.

structure.clarification: Each round contains 5 questions from each category.

scoring.tiebreaker: If scores are tied at the end of any round, individual tossups will be asked until there is a clear winner.

preliminary_stage.clarification: Each round will consist of 50 questions with a random but even distribution of each category
Each round is category-themed; all questions in that round pertain only to the chosen category and will consist of 50 questions.

TournamentPlay.tiebreaker_procedure: At the end of any round (preliminary or championship), if scores are tied, individual tossups will be asked until there is a clear winner.

VersusModes.clarification: Versus modes follow the same trivia format and scoring rules as tournament play.
